sense.name: 当时, at that time, at that moment,
sense.examples:
当时他是学生。
He was a student at that time.
当时我不知道。
I didn't know at that moment.

sense.name: 当时, 当场, at a given time and place, then and there
sense.examples:
绑架者当时被武警击毙。
The kidnapper was shot dead then and there by the armed policeman.
在当时的情况下，这样做是对的。
It was right to do so at that given time and place.

sense.name: 当时, 当场, on the spot, in the act,
sense.examples:
把这件事当场决定下来。
Decide the matter on the spot.
当场抓住
To catch in the act.
